_header: O king of grace and indulgence
Subjects: Christ, hymns to; hymns, to Christ
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to Christ — six quatrains (aaab) including refrain ‘ffili marie virginis’ and burden: ‘Of thy mercy lete vs not mys / ffili marie virginis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O king of grace and IndulgenceBy whome alle thyng hath
                    existence…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Graunte vs thou prince of alle princesfili marie
                        virginis
